title: How to Hold Meetings That Don't Suck, with Andy Frisella - MFCEO15
description: Meetings are an essential part of the life of any business, but contrary to popular belief, they don't have to suck.  From trimming the fat off your agenda to the difference between information and formation, Andy Frisella tells you how to get together and get things done.
content:encoded: Meetings are an essential part of the life of any business, but contrary to popular belief, they don't have to suck.  From trimming the fat off your agenda to the difference between information and formation, Andy Frisella tells you how to get together and get things done.
